definition: an electric railway operating below the surface of the ground (usually in a city), place or enclose in a tube
details:
noun
- an electric railway operating below the surface of the ground (usually in a city)
= example: an electric railway operating below the surface of the ground (usually in a city)
= synonyms: underground
- conduit consisting of a long hollow object (usually cylindrical) used to hold and conduct objects or liquids or gases
= synonyms: tubing
- electronic device consisting of a system of electrodes arranged in an evacuated glass or metal envelope
= synonyms: thermionic vacuum tube, thermionic tube, electron tube, thermionic valve
- (anatomy) any hollow cylindrical body structure
- a hollow cylindrical shape
= synonyms: pipe
verb
- place or enclose in a tube
- ride or float on an inflated tube
= example: ride or float on an inflated tube
- convey in a tube
= example: convey in a tube
- provide with a tube or insert a tube into
